That's it! I will tell you about the Soulshots. These items contain the power of souls. When you use Soulshots, your weapon starts shining and deals serious damage. They are very important items that are incredibly useful when attacking with standard weapons.
If you have soulshot in your Inventory, they will automatically move to the shortcut slot and activate. Click the slot with the right mouse button If you decide not to use them.
There also exist Spiritshots, they increase the power of magic. If you want your magic spells to be highly effective, use spiritshots.
